content:
ente shareeram bhakshicchen
raktham paanam cheyyunnon
ennilamarnnitumavanil thaan
njaanumamar nnitumavasaanam
jeevan njaanavanekitume-
nnothiya ni-n mozhi niravettaan
vishvaasamezhum mruthalokam
nin varavin-divasatthinnaayu
nokkippaarkkunnen naathaa!
Nin prathyaa-shayil nidritharaam
ninnatiyaare kartthaave!
Krupayaal jeevippikkenam.

svarggeeyaamgyam vathsalare!
Aathmatthe meyyathilninnum
neekki nayippaan vaanavare
vittitumaa samayam ghoram.

Doothanmaare doorekka-
ndaathmaavanthikavaasikale
sharanam praapicchutane than
charithatthe parishodhicchu.

Paapamaleemasamaanenkil
thaapamotaathmam kezhunnu.
Salkkarmmangale darshicchaal
ulkkuthukatthototheetum.

Deveshaa! Ninthirumeyyum
rakthavumenne nee theetti.
Nyaayasthaanatthava randum
dhyryamenikkekeetatte.
Shuddhanmaarute koottatthil
sthothram njaan paatum sthothram.

likhitham-polavasaanadine
chaarum-vaanum maayumpol
/tthaaram sakalam veezhumpol
/tjyothirnnikaram neengumpol
naathaa!-saadhvikalotthenne
kaattheetenam-vaazhtthum njaan ninne.

ninnishtam cheythoru-dhaarmmikar than praarththanayaale
jeevithalakshuya-vishraamam neti
anthye-sarvveshaa-ninnute karunaabhaajanamaayu
ninthirunaamam-sthuthi cheyyenamival.

en-gaathram bhakshicchuyirelum rudhiram paanam
cheyythone njaan-vetiyaa sheeyolil
ennaa-lavanennum-jeevippaan njaan mruthanaaye-
nneeshan chonno-raa vachanam sthuthyam.

Neethividheeshanotaathmaa-ve-vam
yaa-chicchotheetunnathu njaan kette-nallo.
Mruthigathare prathi naathaa!-a-nge-
ykkarppikkum balikali-lenne rodhi-kka-lle.

Paapikaleennum shishta-nmaare
ve-raakkeetaanee-renmaar vanneetumpol
kaarunyatthin chirakin-keezhil
naa-thaa! Chertthivale-kaakkuka naraka-tthinnum.

Ivale vidhiccheetaruthe-naa-thaa!
Jee-viplavarilevan-vimalan thirumu-mpaa-ke.
Naa-thaa! Ivalil sthithi cheytheetum
ni-nnohari agnikkirayaayu nalkee-ta-lle.

aardrathayaal naathaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
ninmahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivale.

Ivale dharmmishdtanmaaro-
tthanpaal nee paarppikkenam
doshatthe orttheetaathe
veezhchakale maayikkenam.

Praarththana kettivale punyam
cheythorotonnaakkenam.
Aa nirayil sthothram naathaa!
Paateetattival ninperkkaayu.

Aardrathayaal naathaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
ninmahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivale.
